General.Name: Taisol Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: TaiSol Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells thermal management, connectors, and mobile commerce solutions in Taiwan, China, Japan, and the United States. The company offers thermal management solutions, including heat sinks, thermal modules, heat pipes, vapor chambers, and liquid cooling system. Further, it provides connectors and radiators, computer electrical and electronic connectors, wires and cables, and magnesium-aluminum alloy parts. TaiSol Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Po-Hsin  Yu
1.Title: Representative Director & Special Assistant to Gen. Mang.
